name: Beyond Good And Evil
description:
Controls:

x on ground - swap form

c on ground - jump

arrow keys - move

Good

  • c - dive kick, turn evil after a timer.
  • x - teleport sideways.
  • z - if far from obstacles, fast dash.

Evil

  • c - jump, turn good.
  • x - lose control dash.
  • z - teleport down, cancel dash.
